ygData.subject: Re: New Patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: It is called Denon s Desperate Dirge, it is level 43, i do not know if an instrument is used.  It supposedly does a radius dmg of 400+ to up to 4 creatures.
ygData.messageBody:
It is called Denon's Desperate Dirge, it is level 43, i do not know if an
instrument is used. It supposedly does a radius dmg of 400+ to up to 4
creatures. IT takes all of your mana so that it can not be used too often.
It should be found in freeport and qeynos after the next patch, hopefully
tomorrow night/tuesday morning?!? i do not know if much else is known about
this song. it is the ONLY song that will use mana.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 44 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Codo the Mysterious [mailto:codo@...]
> Sent: Sunday, June 13, 1999 6:35 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Patch.
>
>
> From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
> Could I get some more clarification on this song? I know I am
> only level 8,
> but I prefer to keep meticulous records, and this song
> appears nowhere in my
> information....
>
> Thanks,
>
> Lulen
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 12:02
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Patch.
>
>
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > when you say "We'd kicked around the idea around", does
> that mean you are
> > part of the development team? i know you are level 45+ bard right?
> anyway,
> > any info on where the song is found? i think the 5 bard
> vendors have been
> > checked. plus i heard it is level 43, so i want it =)
> >
> > Shada Silverleaf, Level 43 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: J.M. Capozzi [mailto:croak63@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 6:01 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Patch.
> >
> >
> > It has no effect at all on Clarity and the rate at which your party
> members
> > regen mana.
> >
> > The Desperate Dirge is VERY powerful for a bard song. Most
> bard songs are
> > classified as cantrips, quick little spells that have minor
> duration and
> > impact when song once, but add up over time. This song
> breaks out of that
> > mold completely. The mana use, and the lack of regen, was
> needed to keep
> it
> > from being overused. As the name implies, it's a last
> ditch effort on the
> > bard's part to end a combat.
> >
> > We'd kicked around the idea of the song stunning the bard
> for 10 to 30
> > seconds as another balance factor, or using a horn or lute
> as a consumable
> > reagent, but neither proved practical, or easy to code.
> The change making
> > bards immune to mana regen was relatively easy to implement.
> >
> > It's going to take at least 30 minutes of just sitting to
> regen all that
> > mana once you cast the song, twice that if you remain
> standing. And thats
> > as it should be. The song rivals harm touch at that level
> in damage done
> (A
> > 43rd level SK can do 430 to a SINGLE target), and this song
> will hit FOUR
> > targets. That's 1600 damage, fast. It's use should be limited.
> >
> > And it might encourage bards to wear more mana and mana
> stat boosting
> items,
> > so they can have a larger mana reserve to draw from,
> speeding downtime
> > between songs a bit. This is fine, as it means in most
> cases that they'll
> > have to give up better armor to wear the low or no AC
> caster tuned garb.
> > ----- Original Message -----
> >
> > From: Douglas <mailto:Bierbower@...> Bierbower
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com <mailto:eqbards@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 5:10 PM
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Patch.
> >
> > I read it the same way.
> >
> > Actually, the patch message seemed to indicate their would
> be no method
> > possible to speed up a bard's mana regen rate, it gave no
> indication of
> any
> > change that would alter how current bard songs *may* speed
> mana regen for
> > other party members (or maybe I just read it wrong).
> >
> > Ariell, Karana Server
> > -the resident "dumb" bard *smiles*
> >
> >
> > George Holt wrote:
> >
> >
> > in addition there is no way for bards to speed up mana
> regen... (sorry,
> > those buffs won't work...)
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
